thread.section_title: Executive Hotel LeSoleil - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location/Great Hotel -
thread.title_full: Perfect Location/Great Hotel - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Scott L
title: Perfect Location/Great Hotel -
text: We looked at many different hotels for our weekend in New York and finally took the plunge with this one. The hotel was nice and whilst the rooms are small as many have mentioned before, you just make do and make the best of it. The staff were great and the room was clean and perfect for our needs. We were on the 18th floor and had a great view of the New York skyline. Would recommend the Izakaya Mew Japanese restaurant which was on the same block, one street down. Difficult to find as in a basement but worth the hunt. Probably one of our best ever meals, amazing! One slight issue was being charged the wrong rate on checking in. Having booked on booking.com with an excellent rate, we were charged the full rate but luckily noticed. What out for that one! All in all a great hotel in midtown and ideal for a weekend break in the Big Apple.
